author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify run21 tracker flat minus10percent material files by taking care of multiple occurrence of materials in the definition of composite materials

#### PR validation:

Use cfg's in Geometry/TrackerCommonData/test/python

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

May be back ported to 12_0_X. To be decided later
title: Run3-trk09B Modify run21 tracker flat minus10percent material files by taking care of multiple occurrence of materials in the definition of composite materials
